content.rendered:
At FFI, we provide global talent mobility solutions as a single-window partner to support your needs. FFI helps clients place their employees in a different country or location where the company may not have its presence or cannot directly deploy its employees. Also known as Secondment, it has a broad range of services, including visa processing, relocation logistics, HR/Payroll processing, amongst others to choose from.

  • Holistic solutions with one IT staffing provider
  • 100% compliance with law of the land
  • Comprehensive payroll solutions
  • Strategic local partners for seamless collaboration
  • Faster deployment, easy migration and smooth business expansion
